sentences.sContent: Good golfers do better if they give themselves little time to prepare for their shots--and even better if they are distracted by researchers asking them to count irregularly spaced sounds.
sentences.sContent_eng: Good golfers do better if they give themselves little time to prepare for their shots--and even better if they are distracted by researchers asking them to count irregularly spaced sounds.
sentences.sCn: 优秀的高尔夫球手在击球前准备的时间越少成绩越好—即使被研究人员骚扰，让他们数不规则间隔的声响，最后击球成绩依然不俗。

sentences.sContent: The glove went through a series of designs, with dots and patches of different shapes and colors, but the current version is covered with 20 irregularly shaped patches that use 10 different colors.
sentences.sContent_eng: The glove went through a series of designs, with dots and patches of different shapes and colors, but the current version is covered with 20 irregularly shaped patches that use 10 different colors.
sentences.sCn: 这个手套经过了一系列的设计，试过不同形状和颜色的点状和块状布料，不过目前的版本是覆盖着20种不规则形状、10种不同颜色的块状布料。

words.tran: 不规则的；无规律的；非正规的；不合法的
不规则物；不合规格的产品
